page.title: 10FARMING
page.content: The area has approx.{fifteen farms} all of a varying nature.Many grow {cereal}crops...wheat,barley whilst others keep{livestock.}The area contains the largest outdoor herd of pigs.Other farms raise{cattle,sheep} {and chickens. } Spring is the time when the fields are ploughed and seeds sown,Summer brings pungent smells of liquid manure and Autumn is harvest time. Farms also grow{potatoes,sweet corn {and peas.}Some of the produce is sold at Farm Shops. The area also contains a{Trout} {Farm,Watercress beds}and a reserve for {breeding game birds.} Farming remains an important {employment factor}of the area.
